Content: The First Round of competitions of the Youth with Talent third generation commences today. You can watch the competitions on every Saturday at 9.00 p.m. on ITN from today. The Youth with Talent program is produced jointly by the National Youth Services Council and ITN. The first and second seasons of the Youth with Talent program which introduced the talents of Sri Lankan youth to the world were well received by the viewers. The Youth with Talent 3rd Generation hopes to introduce another generation of talented youth to the nation. You can watch the first round of the Talents of Youth at 9.00 p.m. on ITN today.
